FAQ / Custom Cards / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Characters /
WARNING: This card is a part of a custom card set; it is not an official Wizards of the Coast TF:TCG card.

Slipstream, Spy-for-Hire

  1. Can Slipstream’s flip-to-Alt ability give her the +1 ATK when it goes off? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes.
  2. What if my opponent has no cards in hand and I flip-to-Alt mode? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Each of your Decepticons will get +1 attack as there is no card to discard with more than one icon, so the “Otherwise” ability will work the same as if you revealed a card with two or more pips to the ability.
